articles.author: Polo Sandoval, Rebekah Riess
articles.title: 4 US citizens missing after being assaulted and kidnapped in Matamoros, Mexico, FBI says - CNN
articles.description: Four US citizens were assaulted and kidnapped after crossing the border into northeastern Mexico on Friday, according to the FBI, which is working to locate the missing Americans.
articles.content:
Four US citizens were assaulted and kidnapped after crossing the border into northeastern Mexico on Friday, according to the FBI, which is working to locate the missing Americans.

articles.author: Jessica Chasmar
articles.title: DeSantis rips Newsom in California speech, says state ‘hemorrhaging population’ to Florida - Fox News
articles.description: Florida Gov. Ron DeSantis ripped California Gov. Gavin Newsom on his home turf Sunday, saying Florida has "witnessed a great American exodus from states governed by leftist politicians."
articles.content: Florida Republican Gov. Ron DeSantis ripped California Democrat Gov. Gavin Newsom during a speech Sunday in the Golden State, saying Californians are fleeing the state in droves to live in Florida wh… [+4464 chars]
